about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, V-Marc India Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing and marketing wires and cables under the brand name of "V-Marc". The company manufactures and sells a diversified range of wires and cables i.e. single & multistrand cables, LAN cables, coaxial cables, CCTV cables, telephone switchboard cables, power cables, core flat cables, solar cables, wires, and aerial bunched cables, etc.

The company sells its products through multiple channels; 1. government tenders to supply products for government projects, 2. supply to EPC contractors for turnkey projects, and 3. dealer and distribution network to directly sell to private companies. It supplies its products across industries i.e. power, real estate, railways, and telecom sector. As of Dec 31, 2020, it has a strong network of 650+ dealers across 12 states.

The firm has two manufacturing facilities located at Haridwar, Uttarakhand with an aggregate installed capacity of 71,100 KM p.a and also proposes to set-up a new manufacturing facility with a total capacity of 11,520 km p.a.

Competitive strengths

  • Diversified product portfolio with a wide range of wires and cables.
  • Geographically diversified customer base.
  • Strong dealer network distribution.
  • Experienced and dedicated management.

faqs.question: What is the V-Marc India IPO?
faqs.answer:
V-Marc India IPO is a SME IPO of 6000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.40 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹39 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 25, 2021, and closes on March 31, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in V-Marc India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in V-Marc India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in V-Marc India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in V-Marc India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'V-Marc India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When V-Marc India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The V-Marc India IPO opens on March 25, 2021 and closes on March 31, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of V-Marc India IPO?
faqs.answer: V-Marc India IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,17,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for V-Marc India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in V-Marc India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is V-Marc India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for V-Marc India IPO will be done on Tuesday, April 6, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, April 8, 2021. Check the V-Marc India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is V-Marc India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The V-Marc India IPO listing date is on Friday, April 9, 2021.
